name: Time Machine (itch) (BAVC Next-Gen)
description:
You’ve been selected to visit the Arctic in the far future, but your malfunctioning time machine takes you to the past! Talk to the locals, make friends,  and find a way home! 

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
Space Bar to jump
X key for dialogue

Created by Sahil Sharma, 2021

This semester in Game Code Design students worked on portraying themes of mental wellbeing and exploration by developing a simple 2D side scroller game set in San Francisco. As their player will move through the city, they’ll stop to engage in playful dialogue with other characters.
